function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased airborne infection risk due to excess CO2 and occupancy","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne infection if not mitigated","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling excess CO2 levels, and managing occupancy","Technologies":"CO2 monitoring systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Occupants in the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Complex ventilation flows and air flow between spaces","Impact":"Uncertain and unpredictable ventilation patterns","Mitigation":"Further work on understanding ventilation implications and effects","Technologies":"Air flow modeling software, ventilation analysis tools","People":"Building and environmental engineers","Owner":"Building designers, engineering firms"},{"Description":"Variability of COVID-19 airborne spread based on environmental conditions and activity level","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission in specific conditions","Mitigation":"Monitoring outdoor air supply, evaluating ventilation provision based on environmental data","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring sensors, air quality analyzers","People":"Public and occupants in the built environment","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners"}]}
